home.announcementBanner: Aww yisss, this is an exciting announcement! Or maybe its an advertisement!

features.title: Ready to Go
features.text: Vuetify comes ready to go with 5 pre-made vue-cli templates. From simple html to full-blown SSR you are ready to go in minutes.

features.title: Semantic Material Components
features.text: Be prepared for an armada of specialized components at your disposal. With over 80 in total, there is a solution for any application.

features.title: Vibrant Community
features.text: Got a question about using the framework? Join our community Discord server-- there's probably someone that can help you!
